attributes.additional_details: Given the current ongoing austerity measures which will continue into the next parliament, is it wise to send more money to the third world nations?. Africa has been a problem for over 30 years now and Red Nose Day money is going to be sent there as well. The Government should tell Red Nose Day organisers that at least until things get better at home not to send more money to Africa. Lets help the ever increasing number of poor people at home in their own country.
